title: Software Engineer
desc: Involves continuous testing, debugging, and maintenance to uphold the reliability and performance of the software systems, ultimately supporting the insurance company in delivering high-quality services to its clients.

title: Software Engineer
desc: Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including mechanical engineers, industrial designers, and quality assurance professionals, to understand their specific needs and challenges. Maintaining and upgrading existing software systems, ensuring they align with the latest industry standards and cybersecurity protocols.
